resources.string: Turn this on if you only see \"Battery\" after adding the tile.
Show battery info in tile title
Set the text shown when your phone isn\'t charging
Set the text shown when your phone is charging
Customize how the tile looks and behaves
Customize the text shown on the tile
Unavailable with the settings you have enabled
When should the tile be on?

Customise the text displayed on the tile. The following placeholders can be used to display information regarding the battery on the tile:

• %%c: Current of the battery in milliamperes
• %%a: Average current of the battery in milliamperes
• %%t: Temperature of the battery in Celsius
• %%f: Temperature of the battery in Fahrenheit
• %%v: Voltage of the battery
• %%w: Wattage of the battery
• %%l: Current battery percentage

So, for example, setting the text to "Battery: %%l%%" would result in the tile displaying "Battery: 69%%".

Leaving this field blank will result in the tile displaying %1$s

Customise the text displayed on the tile. The following placeholders can be used to display information regarding the battery on the tile:

• %%c: Current of the battery in milliamperes
• %%a: Average current of the battery in milliamperes
• %%t: Temperature of the battery in Celsius
• %%f: Temperature of the battery in Fahrenheit
• %%v: Voltage of the battery
• %%w: Wattage of the battery
• %%l: Current battery percentage
• %%h: Hours until battery is charged
•%%m: Minutes until battery is charged

So, for example, setting the text to "Battery: %%l%%" would result in the tile displaying "Battery: 69%%".

Leaving this field blank will result in the tile displaying %1$s
the battery percentage and a charge time estimate.
